itunes:title: Episode 1026 - Mr. Patterson Goes To Washington
title: Episode 1026 - Mr. Patterson Goes To Washington
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross recaps his trip to the White House to campaign for the Creative Coalition of Arts and HR 5581 -- including the car that crashed into his hotel, what Democrats were saying about the midterm elections behind the scenes, how old most of Congress looked...
itunes:summary:
Ross recaps his trip to the White House to campaign for the Creative Coalition of Arts and HR 5581 -- including the car that crashed into his hotel, what Democrats were saying about the midterm elections behind the scenes, how old most of Congress looked, and what The Strokes lead singer Julian Casablancas and ‘Young Sheldon’ star Iain Armitage were like in real life.

Ross recaps his trip to the White House to campaign for the Creative Coalition of Arts and HR 5581 -- including the car that crashed into his hotel, what Democrats were saying about the midterm elections behind the scenes, how old most of Congress looked, and what The Strokes lead singer Julian Casablancas and ‘Young Sheldon’ star Iain Armitage were like in real life.
